commenter_a: You'll fit in with the self-important Hollyweird glitterati JKR. The British have never been enamoured of their paid entertainers except for simply that, as entertainers, who are well paid for their craft. The disenchanted and disenfranchised led the way with Brexit. Believe me, those who formed this majority are not racist not are they Ill educated. Nor are they of the lower socio-economic strata of society. They are the majority who stopped being intimidated by the PC brigade. The U.S. followed and Europe is next. The pendulum has swung back in reaction to the rot spreading from the highest echelons of government down, aided and abetted by a dishonest press and a compliant and unrepresentative public service.
